addr: Starr Foundation Hall. 63 Fifth Avenue. New York, NY 10011
title: City & State Public Projects Forum
desc:
The conference will highlight the tristate area?s current and upcoming public projects and the bidding process for these major developments. Learn what federal, state and local agency leaders are saying about where construction and development opportunities will be this year and in the years ahead. 
 Learn from industry experts how to maximize your ability to win public contracts and what agencies are seeking related to new technology, green business practices, community and MWBE participation and other project requirements. 
 Introduction -  Adam Lubinsky , PhD, AICP, Managing Principal, WXY Studio 
 9:15am - Tristate Mayor?s Panel on Municipal Planning for Public Projects: 
 Speakers: 
 
 Noam Bramson , Mayor of New Rochelle, NY 
 Reginald Spinello , Mayor of Glen Cove, NY 
 Mark Sokolich , Mayor of Fort Lee, NJ 
 
 10:00am - Commissioners and Agency Heads on Long-Term Planning: 
 Speakers: 
 
 Commissioner Feniosky Pena-Mora , NYC Department of Design & Construction 
 Holly Leicht, Regional Administrator , Housing & Urban Development (HUD) 
 Catherine Rinaldi , Executive Vice President, Metro-North Railroad
